entry.title: Gaza Fighting Risks Resurgence of Terrorist Attacks
entry.content: An outpouring of support from militant Islamist groups for Hamasâ€™s bloody incursion into Israel is stirring fears of a resurgence of terrorist acts in the West that, until recently, appeared to be on the decline.

entry.title: Israel Evacuates City Near Lebanon Border as It Hits Scores of Targets in Gaza
entry.content: The decision to move residents of Kiryat Shmona, a city of some 22,000 people, reflects Israeli concern over a second front opening to the north.
